Kevin Han Huang 黄瀚
About Me Research Teaching { x ∉ Maths } Collection

Papers

    1. Quantifying the Effects of Data Augmentation arXiv K. Huang, P. Orbanz, M. Austern

Projects

    1. [Statslab]((http://www.statslab.cam.ac.uk/) and Computer Laboratory, Cambridge. I wrote my master essay on a review of the theoretical foundations on neural tangent kernels, examined by Neil Lawrence and Rajen Shah.
    1. Cambridge Image Analysis Group and Statslab, Cambridge. I worked on reviewing the Regularisation by Denoising framework in the context of image inverse problems. I was supervised by Sam Power, Sebastian Lunz, and Carola-Bibiane Schönlieb.
    1. Hackbridge. I worked on multi-object 6d vpose prediction from 2d images with Dominik A. Kloepfer, supervised by Nicolai Wojke.
    1. Statslab, Cambridge. I worked on outlier detection in time series of graphs and extreme value theory, supervised by Yi Yu and Jenny Wadsworth.
